faq.q: Who is eligible to use the TOlindo mobile app?
faq.a: You must be at least eighteen (18) years old to use the TOlindo mobile app.

faq.q: How do I pay for the service?
faq.a: TOlindo will charge the payment method you specify (either Wallet or Credit Card) at the time of purchase or checkout.

faq.q: What are TOlindo’s guidelines for handling deliveries during this Covid-19 Pandemic?
faq.a: TOlindo is committed to ensuring the health and safety of its drivers and customers. Our safety standards follow the Ontario and Public Health Recommendations which states the following: All drivers must wear a face covering or mask during pick-up and drop-off of packages. All drivers are to wash or sanitize their hands before every pick-up and after the drop-off of packages. Both drivers and customers must take specific actions to prioritize both parties’ health and safety, like wearing a face covering or mask, sanitizing hands and maintaining a 2-metres distance when physical interactions are unavoidable. Make sure to be available to receive notifications when your packages arrive. Wait for a call from the delivery driver letting you know that your package has arrived and is now at your doorstep.

faq.q: Where and when can I drive for TOlindo?
faq.a: TOlindo delivery and courier services are available from 8 AM to 7PM, 7 days a week within the Downtown Toronto area. We offer a 30-minute delivery guarantee within our red zone, on-demand and same day delivery services as well. Our scheduled delivery option is available for customers to receive their packages the same day, or the following day the latest! To view a map of our service areas, go to the app’s navigation menu. Tap “About”, then tap “Delivery Areas”.

faq.q: How do I become a TOlindo driver?
faq.a: To sign up as a TOlindo Driver. You may also download the TOlindo Driver app to register and submit your application.TOlindo Driver for iOS TOlindo Driver for Android We will review your application and contact you soon for further details.

faq.q: I don’t have a vehicle. Can I still drive for TOlindo?
faq.a: Of course! You can drive for TOlindo as an employee and we will provide and assign you the service vehicle to use for delivery. Currently, our TOlindo fleet includes E-Bikes.

faq.q: What services can TOlindo offer my business?
faq.a: At TOlindo, we provide our clients with the technology to connect with their customers and delivery partners to optimize efficiency. With our app, you can customize your virtual store and promote your brand to attract more customers. We are constantly looking for ways to better our services and offer more attractive terms to our clients. We will advertise and create promotions & discounts, to promote our partners and users.

faq.q: Will I be provided with a device to help me manage my store?
faq.a: TOlindo will supply you with a tablet to allow you easy access to your items via the app, manage and process your orders.
